name: ComposeYourself
description:
-WARNING-

Download the game for a better experience

-About-

You are a conductor's assistant on your way to the first performance of the Video Game Music Orchestra! As you enter the building, you trip and drop all of the sheet music. It is up to you to remember the correct order before the concert! 

Listen carefully to each of the musical blocks as they play to determine where they belong in the song. You can press the 'help' button on the right of the screen to listen to the full original song for reference.

-Credits-
